availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Edwards (Henry County, Kentucky, grocery keeper and captain (U.S.A.))

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, grocery keeper and captain (U.S.A.). Kentucky native. Married to Joanna Edwards. Grocery keeper in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as captain from September 14, 1862, to September 11, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Newcastle, p. 241.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Newcastle, p. 198A.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 245.
